item.title: Add Custom Validations With Lombok Builders
item.description: Introduction Java Beans encapsulates many objects into one single object and have getters and setters to access the properties. This code is boilerplate and can be a candidate for code gen. IDEs can help in achieve this type of code as well. But for the purpose of this post lets use Project Lombok and see how it can helps for builder pattern with validationa.
